Setting.RevealControlled.Title: Reveal controlled tokens
Setting.RevealControlled.Hint: Fully reveal tokens the player controls? This can be useful when playing with vision cones
Setting.RevealNpc.Title: Reveal visible NPC tokens
Setting.RevealNpc.Hint: If one player can see an NPC, reveal that token to all other players?
Setting.PlayerVision.Title: Share player vision
Setting.PlayerVision.Hint: Share vision between all players; similar to giving Observer permission to all player tokens
